description: Luton Town want to make Wycombe Wanderers boss Matt Bloomfield their new manager and are close to making an appointment, according to reports.
title: Luton Town set to appoint Matt Bloomfield as new boss
title_page: Luton Town set to appoint Matt Bloomfield as new boss - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Luton Town want to make Wycombe Wanderers boss Matt Bloomfield their new manager and are close to making an appointment. (The Guardian), external
The Hatters are also set to battle Sheffield United for the Â£4m signing of midfielder Timothy Ouma from Swedish top flight side IF Elfsborg. (Football League World), external
